des: "I use this glaze on brownies, BundtÂ® cake, ice cream, or whatever needs a little chocolate. It's rich, decadent, and oh so easy!"
ins: Melt cocoa and butter together in a small saucepan over low heat, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat; stir in confectioners' sugar and vanilla extract. Stir in hot water, 1 teaspoon at a time, until glaze is thick and smooth.
